text: Events from the year 1455 in Scotland. ==Incumbents== * Monarch – James II ==Events== * 1 May – Battle of Arkinholm ends in a decisive victory for supporters of James II against the rebel Douglases ==Deaths== * Archibald Douglas, Earl of Moray, nobleman (born 1426) * Hugh Douglas, Earl of Ormonde, nobleman (unknown) ==References== Category:Years of the 15th century in Scotland
title: 1455 in Scotland
